categories: Heat Sock XLP One Heat Socks
description: A spare pair of socks to work with the Hotronic Heat Sock XLP battery-powered heated sock system.Made of nylon, spandex and merino wool in thick knit for warmth.Padding on the shins adds comfort for hiking and skiing.Integrated heating element works with the Hotronic Heat Sock XLP battery (sold separately).Unisex sizes: Small fits Mens 4-6, Women's 5-7. Medium fits Mens 7-8, Women's 8-9. Large fits Mens 9-10, Women's 10-11. XL fits Mens 11-13.Socks only. Battery sold separately.
name: Hotronic Heat Sock XLP One Heat Socks - Unisex
